title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.24 - Panhandling
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.24 - Panhandling

State Regulations

Panhandling is prohibited in all parks, including any park
streets adjacent to or abutting a park and sidewalks of such abutting
streets. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9003.24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
